name: v0.4.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pmd", version = "0.4.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pmd",
    sha256 = "dfdf3c356e5c74328c272a1e77ec0225d76423308ad208261a18dbb284745479",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_pmd-0.4.1",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/releases/download/v0.4.1/bazel_rules_pmd-v0.4.1.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update MODULE.bazel version to 0.4.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/56
* Bump bazel-contrib/.github from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/57
* Bump actions/checkout from 3.6.0 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/58
* Add WORKSPACE tests to CI by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/59


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

name: v0.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_pmd", version = "0.4.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_pmd",
    sha256 = "545303af6d442d36ec5d809eff7f4da212f0ec0bfd70fa32e033e6e747dbed0e",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_rules_pmd-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/releases/download/v0.4.0/bazel_rules_pmd-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Bump actions/checkout from 3.5.2 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/47
* Let repo maintainers name the toplevel target by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/44
* Add support for Bzlmod by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/48
* Add Bzlmod docs to README by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/49
* Remove pmd_version doc string from pmd/toolchains.bzl by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/50
* Update PMD 6.50.0 -> 6.55.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/51
* Add docs for setting custom PMD versions by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/52
* Fix extension dependency name by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/53
* Add BCR configuration by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/54
* Align bazel_skylib verion with Bzlmod by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/55


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
```starlark
rules_pmd_version="0.3.0"
rules_pmd_sha="d83108d156ed686df997f161059a4e614249ac883bdb14da46366060d400f674"
```

PMD is now a `test` target rule (still supports caching) and needs to be run with `bazel test //my:pmd_target`!

## What's Changed

* **BREAKING**: Convert pmd to bazel test-target by @davidkurkov in  https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/43
* Fix argument names used in processing pmd-execution result by @davidkurkov in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/42
* Use non-deprecated runPmd method by @davidkurkov in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/41
* Enable Dependabot by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/34
## New Contributors
* @davidkurkov made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/41

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
```starlark
rules_pmd_version="0.2.0"
rules_pmd_sha="54b76b07b32c10886d50af52188a1410ec95e046f0425ad23c484e9d8de3b7f7"
```

## What's Changed
* Update Bazel 4.0.0 â†’ 5.0.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/24
* Update Bazel from 5.0.0 -> 5.3.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/26
* Update rules_jvm_external from 4.2 -> 4.4.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/27
* Use -R when setting rulesets by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/28
* Update bazel-skylib from 1.0.3 -> 1.3.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/29
* Update io_bazel_stardoc from 0.4.0 -> 0.5.3 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/30
* Update PMD from 6.32.0 -> 6.50.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/31
* Switch to Zulu JDK, setup-bazelisk, and buildifier_prebuilt by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/32
* (Breaking change) Support the latest versions of PMD by @Bencodes in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/33

## New Contributors
* @Bencodes made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/pull/24

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildfoundation/bazel_rules_pmd/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0
